title: Environment
summary: Laravel application with login bypass, file upload vulnerability, and privilege escalation via BASH_ENV exploitation.

title: Editor
summary: XWiki 15.10.8 vulnerable to RCE (CVE-2025-24893) with subsequent privilege escalation via Netdata SUID binaries, resulting in full system compromise.

title: Soulmate
summary: Exploited a CrushFTP authentication bypass vulnerability (CVE-2025-31161) to gain initial access, then used an exposed internal Erlang service to escalate privileges to root.
